# Arachne
[color=#808080]Arachne are [color=#b3b3b3]young adults[/color] until age 40, [color=#b3b3b3]adults[/color] until age 80, [color=#b3b3b3]middle-aged[/color] until age 120, [color=#b3b3b3]older[/color] until age 160, and [color=#b3b3b3]elderly[/color] beyond that point.[/color]
Arachne are a race whose upper body resembles a humanoid's, while their lower body resembles a gigantic spider.
They natively know the Arachnic language.
## Diet
- They are innate bloodfeeders, and derive thirst, nourishment, and health restoration from drinking blood of any kind (except their own).
## Benefits - They cannot be slipped. - They move faster compared to a human. - They take less damage from barotrauma (extreme pressure differences). - They can control their movement in zero-gravity environments.
## Special - Capable of spinning silk, producing webs, and wrapping victims in cocoons. They can also suck the blood out of a cocooned victim. - Their intoxicating blood is strongly alcoholic, on the level of vodka.
## Drawbacks - They cannot wear shoes or most full-body protective gear, such as hardsuits.
